channel.title: Language on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Language on Arrans github.io

item.title: slint-ui/slint
item.description: Slint is an open-source declarative GUI toolkit to build native user interfaces for Rust, C++, JavaScript, or Python apps.

item.title: f/awesome-chatgpt-prompts
item.description: This repo includes ChatGPT prompt curation to use ChatGPT and other LLM tools better.

item.title: rust-lang/rust
item.description: Empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software.

item.title: ziglang/zig
item.description: General-purpose programming language and toolchain for maintaining robust, optimal, and reusable software.

item.title: microsoft/TypeScript
item.description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that compiles to clean JavaScript output.

item.title: carbon-language/carbon-lang
item.description: Carbon Language’s main repository: documents, design, implementation, and related tools. (NOTE: Carbon Language is experimental; see README)

item.title: dart-lang/sdk
item.description: The Dart SDK, including the VM, JS and Wasm compilers, analysis, core libraries, and more.

item.title: kcl-lang/kcl
item.description: KCL Programming Language (CNCF Sandbox Project). https://kcl-lang.io

item.title: nim-lang/Nim
item.description: Nim is a statically typed compiled systems programming language. It combines successful concepts from mature languages like Python, Ada and Modula. Its design focuses on efficiency, expressiveness, and elegance (in that order of priority).

item.title: natalie-lang/natalie
item.description: a work-in-progress Ruby compiler, written in Ruby and C++

item.title: glebbash/LO
item.description: LO - small programming language targeting WASM that aims to be as simple as possible
